key.name: detect-encodings
key.description: Meld will use these text encodings to try to decode loaded text files before trying any other encodings. In addition to the encodings in this list, UTF-8 and the current locale-default encoding will always be used; other encodings may also be tried, depending on the user’s locale.

key.name: indent-width
key.description: The number of spaces to use for a single indent step

key.name: insert-spaces-instead-of-tabs
key.summary: Whether to indent using spaces or tabs
key.description: If true, any new indentation will use spaces instead of tabs.

key.name: show-line-numbers
key.description: If true, line numbers will be shown in the gutter of file comparisons.

key.name: highlight-syntax
key.description: Whether to highlight syntax in comparisons. Because of Meld’s own color highlighting, this is off by default.

key.name: style-scheme
key.summary: Color scheme to use for syntax highlighting
key.description: Used by GtkSourceView to determine colors for syntax highlighting

key.name: enable-space-drawer
key.description: If true, whitespace characters will be drawn in comparisons even if they are not in a changed area.

key.name: wrap-mode
key.description: Lines in file comparisons will be wrapped according to this setting, either not at all ('none'), at any character ('char') or only at the end of words ('word').

key.name: highlight-current-line
key.description: If true, the line containing the cursor will be highlighted in file comparisons.

key.name: use-system-font
key.summary: Use the system default monospace font
key.description: If false, custom-font will be used instead of the system monospace font.

key.name: custom-font
key.description: The custom font to use, stored as a string and parsed as a Pango font description.

key.name: show-overview-map
key.description: If true, file comparisons will have paired source maps for compared files.

key.name: overview-map-style
key.description: Style options for how the overview map is displayed.

key.name: ignore-blank-lines
key.summary: Ignore blank lines when comparing files
key.description: If true, blank lines will be trimmed when highlighting changes between files.

key.name: use-system-editor
key.description: If false, custom-editor-command will be used instead of the system editor when opening files externally.

key.name: custom-editor-command
key.description: The command used to launch a custom editor. Some limited templating is supported here; at the moment '{file}' and '{line}' are recognised tokens.

key.name: folder-columns
key.description: List of column names in folder comparison and whether they should be displayed.

key.name: folder-ignore-symlinks
key.description: If true, folder comparisons do not follow symbolic links when traversing the folder tree.

key.name: folder-shallow-comparison
key.description: If true, folder comparisons compare files based solely on size and mtime, considering files to be identical if their size and mtime match, and different otherwise.

key.name: folder-time-resolution
key.description: When comparing based on mtime, this is the minimum difference in nanoseconds between two files before they’re considered to have different mtimes. This is useful when comparing files between filesystems with different timestamp resolution.

key.name: folder-filter-text
key.summary: Apply text filters during folder comparisons
key.description: If true, folder comparisons that compare file contents also apply active text filters and the blank line trimming option, and ignore newline differences.

key.name: folder-status-filters
key.description: List of statuses used to filter visible files in folder comparison.

key.name: vc-console-visible
key.summary: Show the version control console output
key.description: If true, a console output section will be shown in version control views, showing the commands run for version control operations.

key.name: vc-console-pane-position
key.description: This is the height of the main version control tree when the console pane is shown.

key.name: vc-left-is-local
key.description: If true, version control comparisons will use a left-is-local, right-is-remote scheme to determine what order to present files in panes. Otherwise, a left-is-theirs, right-is-mine scheme is used.

key.name: vc-merge-file-order
key.summary: Order for files in three-way version control merge comparisons
key.description: Choices for file order are remote/merged/local and local/merged/remote. This preference only affects three-way comparisons launched from the version control view, so is used solely for merges/conflict resolution within Meld.

key.name: vc-show-commit-margin
key.summary: Show margin in commit message editor
key.description: If true, a guide will be displayed to show what column the margin is at in the version control commit message editor.

key.name: vc-commit-margin
key.summary: Margin column in commit message editor
key.description: The column at which to show the margin in the version control commit message editor.

key.name: vc-break-commit-message
key.description: If true, the version control commit message editor will hard-wrap (i.e., insert line breaks) at the commit margin before commit.

key.name: vc-status-filters
key.description: List of statuses used to filter visible files in version control comparison.

key.name: filename-filters
key.default: [ ("Backups", true, "#*# .#* ~* *~ *.{orig,bak,swp}"), ("OS-specific metadata", true, ".DS_Store ._* .Spotlight-V100 .Trashes Thumbs.db Desktop.ini"), ("Version Control", true, "_MTN .bzr .svn .svn .hg .fslckout _FOSSIL_ .fos CVS _darcs .git .svn .osc"), ("Binaries", true, "*.{pyc,a,obj,o,so,la,lib,dll,exe}"), ("Media", false, "*.{jpg,gif,png,bmp,wav,mp3,ogg,flac,avi,mpg,xcf,xpm}") ]
key.description: List of predefined filename-based filters that, if active, will remove matching files from a folder comparison.

key.name: text-filters
key.default: [ ("CVS/SVN keywords", false, "\\$\\w+(:[^\\n$]+)?\\$"), ("C++ comment", false, "//.*"), ("C comment", false, "/\\*.*?\\*/"), ("All whitespace", false, "[ \\t\\r\\f\\v]*"), ("Leading whitespace", false, "^[ \\t\\r\\f\\v]*"), ("Trailing whitespace", false, "[ \\t\\r\\f\\v]*$"), ("Script comment", false, "#.*") ]
key.description: List of predefined text-based regex filters that, if active, will remove text from being used in a file comparison. The text will still be displayed, but won’t contribute to the comparison itself.
